document_data.name: Dendy
document_data.mainbody: Corporal '''Dendy''' was a [[human]] [[fighter]] who lived in [[Neverwinter]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relatioships:
Dendy was among the instructors who taught the [[Hero of Neverwinter]] at the [[Neverwinter Academy]].

Dendy believed that [[Herban]] might be a strict disciplinarian, and didn't want to risk getting in trouble for chatting while on duty.
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, Dendy was a corporal of the [[Neverwinter Guard]]. He worked as an instructor specializing in melee weapon combat and assisted instructors Herban and [[Hewwet]]. He usually sparred with the students of the Academy and conducted combat trials.

Dendy harbored hopes of crossing paths with [[Aribeth de Tylmarande]] at the graduation ceremonies, but his life was ended in the attack on the Academy.
